responses.text: Of course bubs, you doing okay?
Duh, I wanted to ask for a favour.
Oops, sorry, I buttdialed you. I don’t understand the phone UI yet.

dialogues.prompt: Honestly, I've been exhausted lately. Work's been nonstop parties, my car's jesterdrive has been acting up so it can only fit four people at the moment, and my balloon-dog Bubbles floated off last week. I miss their squeak, y'know?

responses.text: Awwh, that's a lot to be dealing with. You got any free time coming up, maybe take the edge off?
Wow, yikers. I don’t know what to say. Your life sounds... kinda bad.

dialogues.prompt: I wanted to go see the final showing of "Easy As 1, You, Me" to unwind and feed my parasocial relationship with Milly Pead, but I feel kinda weird going alone... and nobody I knew was free... and then the tickets sold out. I know you hate that kind of thing, or I'd have made you do it with me, heh.

responses.text: I would have gone if you wanted me to! I'm sorry they sold out. Maybe some more will get released?
Yeah, I’d rather chug slugs than watch smug bugs hug.

dialogues.prompt: Thanks, Spreaddy. Yeah, they might, but I'm going to be juggling a lot of stuff all day. We've got a mega-jumbo-party starting soon, won't be home until 6. Speaking of, Jiggles is here to teach me how to juggle, so I better jet!

responses.text: Give Jiggles my love!

dialogues.prompt: Yes, well... I thought that, so that's... that's fine. Listen, my boss is staring conkers at me, I should go.

responses.text: Give big boss Wiggles my love!

dialogues.prompt: Oh, uh, of course. What is it?

responses.text: Can you ask Jiggles to give me back the front two walls of my apartment? It's really draughty in here.
Can you lend me some spounds? I feel like doing a lot of online shopping today.
Can you sort out mum's birthday present this year? You know, like you did last year. Ooh, and dad's too! You know, like you did last year as well.

dialogues.prompt: Uh... oh, my boss is squeaking his nose at me, I've got to start getting ready. It's going to be a long day at work, I won't be home until 6, and I'll probably just head to bed, so... speak to you tomorrow, maybe.

responses.text: Give big boss Wiggles my love!

dialogues.prompt: Oh, I thought you'd seen my message. Are you... free to talk?

responses.text: Of course bubs, you doing okay?
Duh, I wanted to ask for a favour.
I dunno, guess you'll have to ask Milly this weekend...
No, I think I might explode soon!
Milly Pead, yes that's right sis I got us tickets to "Easy as 1, You Me"!

dialogues.prompt: You're kidding! Oh my goodness, Spreaddyyy!

responses.text: You deserve a break, sis. You've always put your whole heart into everything you do, and sometimes that needs to be looking after yourself!

dialogues.prompt: I'm gonna cry myself to sleep now. With happy tears! I'll see you this weekend. I can't believe you're going to sit through 4 hours of musical theatre for me.

responses.text: Don't make me think about it! I love you, sis. Sweet dreams!

dialogues.prompt: Classic you, you dork. I'm wiped out over here. Call me again tomorrow, m'kay?

responses.text: I was just kidding, don't hang up! I was just giving an example of the effortless comedy you'll be seeing from Milly this weekend.
